episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4001_1001_0:
I can see why Wally introduced you to me.
You’re quite skilled.

You said you’re from Paldea. I’ve met a few other
prominent Trainers from there, as well.
Oh, like Nemona and Juliana? They’re my friends!

Ever since I met her, it’s been nothing but “Battle
me! Battle me!” nonstop.

Ahahaha! Sounds like you two have been battling
a lot!
Is that a Gallade? It looks kinda different, though.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4001_1001_1: Excuse me! Who do you think you are?

You’ll regret challenging me and Hatterene to a
battle!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/6801_1031_0:
We’ll cover you in the
color of...us!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/6801_1001_0:
Iron Valiant and I will show you a world yet
to be known!

We’ll show you a glorious future befitting
elites like us!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_0:
What a hassle... We were finally able to calm
it down.

It looks a bit like Gardevoir and Gallade,
but it’s neither.
Do you know what it is, Florian?

I think it’s a Paradox Pokémon that came from the
future—just like my Miraidon!

Yup! It’s similar to something that was listed
in an expedition journal.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_1: So...I’m pretty sure that’s what it is.

Nemona also had a Paradox Pokémon. If I recall,
it was called Scream Tail.

Then...that Pokémon came from the past, and this
one came from the future?
A Pokémon from the future! How fascinating!
Seems so. But it’s a weird vibe.
In any case, you must be Florian!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_2:
I’d like to hear more about Pokémon from the
future. I hear their bodies are like machines!

I thought maybe they could give me some ideas on
supplying energy that’ll last for generations!

What perfect timing! I wasn’t expecting to meet a
Pokémon like this!

Impressive... Pokémon from the future certainly
look different!

Apparently that’s not just because Pokémon
themselves changed.

Many people think technology might’ve played a
part in how Iron Valiant and others look!
I see! Technology of the future sure is something!
Now I’m even more curious! What powers them?
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_3: Does this Pokémon belong to anyone?
Um... Well, Bede caught it, so...
Oh! So it’s Bede’s, is it?

If you wouldn’t mind, would you give me
that Pokémon, for the future’s sake?

From the moment you arrived, you’ve talked about
energy and whatnot. Not once did you call
Iron Valiant by its name.

There’s no way I can leave it with someone who
only sees it as a Pokémon from the future.

Won’t you just cast it aside the moment it doesn’t
meet your expectations? Like you did with me?
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_4: I won’t allow myself or my Pokémon...
to be treated as mere tools for your convenience.

I apologize for not being more considerate of you
and your Pokémon.

However, now that I’ve a lead on how to supply
energy a thousand years into the future, I can’t
give up just yet.

Nothing will come of us butting heads, so here’s a
proposal.

Soon, I’ll be hosting a tournament featuring
Pokémon battles.

Bede, if you can show me you can draw out all of
Iron Valiant’s power...
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4002_1001_5:
then I’ll accept you two being a sync pair is the
best path for it.

you’ll have to accept it’s best for Iron Valiant
to work by my side, for the future’s sake.

Iron Valiant and I will show you how much
stronger we’ll grow!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4003_1101_0:
Bede trained hard with Florian and Wally to
prepare for the tournament.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4003_1001_0:
You two seem a bit concerned about that run-in
with Chairman Rose.
You were acting a little different than usual.

He took me in when I had nobody and taught me
how to live as a Pokémon Trainer.

He was my benefactor, so I strove to be useful
to him...

But I wasn’t the only Trainer he had high
hopes for.

And I could tell when he started to lose interest
in me.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4003_1001_1: I suspect I didn’t meet his expectations.

Eventually, an incident I caused made him lose
whatever faith in me he had left.
To be fair, I had it coming.
Perhaps that’s why I reacted how I did.

The way he looked at Iron Valiant was how he
looked at me.

Are you hoping to prove him wrong
about you?
I do feel that way, to some extent...

But right now, I just want to bond with
Iron Valiant and take our next step as a sync pair.

Others may see it as some unknown future
Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4003_1001_2:
But to me, it’s just a Pokémon like Hatterene and
my other partners. None of them is better than
the others.

I’ll show our strength as a sync pair at the
tournament—to leave no doubt Iron Valiant’s
my partner Pokémon.

I’ll see if I can dig up more info on Iron Valiant!
Maybe it could help!

I came to see if you were planning to harm
Chairman Rose, but it sounds like there was
no need.

Chairman Rose wouldn’t have agreed to a
compromise.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4003_1001_3:
Furthermore, you chose to battle, rather than
run away.

You aren’t acting on my orders, and you aren’t
doing this for the chairman’s sake.

Whether you or Chairman Rose ends up with
Iron Valiant...
I look forward to seeing how this pans out.
Be sure you won’t have any regrets.

I’ll show you a match that’ll go down in Pasio
history!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4004_1101_0: On the day of the tournament...
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4004_1001_0: I can’t control what others think of me...
But I CAN control what kind of person I am.
From now on, only I decide how I live!
Let me see your potential as a sync pair!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4005_1001_0: What a fantastic battle—both of you!

I can’t believe it. You truly do have a strong bond
and incredible talent, Bede.

You’ve grown much stronger and reliable since
we first met—and since your Gym Challenge.
As promised, Iron Valiant is yours.
It’s for the best, for the future’s sake.
I look forward to your success as a sync pair!
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4005_1001_1: Bede, that Pokémon of yours is super rare, right?!

Where’d it come from?! How’d you become
partners?! Tell me about it!
Ugh! Shush! I’m having a moment here!
Iron Valiant is a Paradox Pokémon from the future!
The FUTURE?! So they’re not just from the past?!
That’s AMAZING! Let’s have another battle! C’mon!
I learned something new about Iron Valiant!

I found this piece of info in a paranormal
magazine.
episode_event_ch0246_10_beet/4005_1001_2:
According to one theory, Iron Valiant is a robot
created by a scientist who wanted to make the
most powerful Pokémon of all.
I’m not sure how to feel about that.

Yeah, especially if it was in a paranormal
magazine.
Well, regardless of the article’s authenticity...

I do plan on granting the scientist’s wish. We WILL
become the most powerful sync pair of all.
We can all have more Pokémon battles!

The magazine will need to add a final line to
that article.

“Iron Valiant is the trusty partner of the most elite
Trainer to ever grace Galar...
